name: kubectl get
description: Display one or many resources in a Kubernetes cluster
useCase: Listing all pods with additional details like node name and IP addresses
author: Google (Kubernetes Project)

name: kubectl describe
description: Show detailed information about a specific resource
useCase: Debugging pods by viewing events, status, and configuration details
author: Google (Kubernetes Project)

name: kubectl apply
description: Apply a configuration to a resource by filename or stdin
useCase: Deploying or updating applications using declarative YAML manifests
author: Google (Kubernetes Project)
